name: Salt Devil
resistance: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered
languages: Celestial, Common, Gnoll, Infernal, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The devil's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The devil can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: darkness 1/day each: harm, teleport

traits.name: Variant: Devil Summoning
traits.desc: Summon Devil (1/Day): The salt devil has a 40 percent chance of summoning one salt devil

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is neither undead nor a construct, it also takes 5 (1d10) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw. Plants, oozes, and creatures with the Amphibious, Water Breathing, or Water Form traits have disadvantage on this saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also gains one level of exhaustion.
